Method Detail

getValues

public java.util.Collection<ScopeMember> getValues()
Returns the scope members configured for parsing.

Returns:
The scope members for parsing.

parse

public Scope parse(java.lang.String s)
Parses a Scope from the specified string. Unexpected scope members are ignored. For strict parsing see parseStrict(java.lang.String).

Parameters:
s - A string containing one or more scope members delimited by space.
Returns:
The parsed scope.

parseStrict

public Scope parseStrict(java.lang.String s)
                  throws ParseException
Parses a Scope from the specified string.

Parameters:
s - A string containing one or more scope members delimited by space.
Returns:
The parsed scope.
Throws:
ParseException - If an unexpected scope member is encountered or a StdScopeMember.OPENID is missing.
